name: PIRATE Gems & Jewels Blender FREE
description:
A Classic arcade puzzle blast match -3 game with additional brain twisting mode – Classic, Time Attack & Advanced. It’s 100% FREE to play! You can enjoy the game without splash a single penny.
A frenzy candy game in the pirate ship with shinning gems, jewels & Diamond. This is exciting and easy to play! Blast the treasures and feed pirate king. Enjoy in your jolly fun and show off the mania power of clash.

===How to Play===
1. Twist your brain but don’t jam your mind to connect three or more candy jewels pieces either horizontal or vertical line to unblock and destroy them in line.
2. Mission: To pipe up as many saga points as you can. You will get a time joya bomb and best thunders to strike off those fruit gems in pirate ship simulator. Tap them to make them crush and blast.
3. Surf through thousands of saga levels in this gems gummy gameplay. This is an addictive and delicious farm adventure filled with colorful jewels style blasting effects with a sweet graphic picture.
